bug.short_desc: Resize border has no rounded corners for windows in modern theme

long_desc.thetext: If we take a look at the modern theme, we will see that the widows have rounded corners. Sadly, the resize frame does not have the same rounded corner which means, that the frame does not fit the widows border.

Added a new appearance key for the resize frame of the window which has its own appearance in the modern theme. In case the CSS solution is used, it uses one of the special decorators which have the rounded corners. In simple and classic theme, the new appearance key forwards to the same appearance as before. Additionally made the resize accessor frame protected to get an handle of it in the window classe (its defined in a separate mixin).
